languages.text: "Ваша Светлость, губернатор Драйвстем ожидает в приемной зале. Советую отплатить за задержку задержкой — так вы дадите понять, что поведение Урбенда не осталось незамеченным. Однако не тяните слишком долго — сейчас двор внимательно наблюдает за каждым вашим шагом".

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem is waiting in the audience hall. I advise you to respond to his lateness in kind — that way you can let Urbend know that his behaviour has not gone unremarked. But I would not delay too long — right now, the court is closely observing your every step."
languages.original_text: "Ваша Светлость, губернатор Драйвстем ожидает в приемной зале. Советую отплатить за задержку задержкой — так вы дадите понять, что поведение Урбенда не осталось незамеченным. Однако не тяните слишком долго — сейчас двор внимательно наблюдает за каждым вашим шагом".

traits.locale_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem is waiting in the audience hall. I advise you to reciprocate for his lateness — that way you can let Urbend know that his behavior did not go unnoticed. But I wouldn't take too long — right now, the court is closely observing your every step."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem is waiting in the audience hall. I advise you to reciprocate for his lateness — that way you can let Urbend know that his behavior did not go unnoticed. But I wouldn't take too long — right now, the court is closely observing your every step."

I advise you to respond to his lateness in kind — that way you can let Urbend know that his behaviour has not gone unremarked. But I would not delay too long — right now, the court is closely observing your every step."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem is waiting in the audience hall. I advise you to respond to his lateness in kind — that way you can let Urbend know that his behaviour has not gone unremarked. But I would not delay too long — right now, the court is closely observing your every step."

"Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem is waiting in the audience hall. I advise you to respond to his lateness in kind — that way you can let Urbend know that his behaviour has not gone unremarked. But I would not delay too long — right now, the court is closely observing your every step."

languages.text: “大人，德莱夫斯塔总督正在觐见大厅等候。我个人建议您对他的迟到行为采取同样的方式回应。这样厄本就会明白，他的迟到行为并没有不了了之。不过，我不再耽误您的时间了。此时此刻，您的朝廷正密切关注您的每一步举动。”
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem is waiting in the audience hall. I advise you to respond to his lateness in kind — that way you can let Urbend know that his behaviour has not gone unremarked. But I would not delay too long — right now, the court is closely observing your every step."

traits.locale_text: “大人，德莱夫斯塔总督正在觐见大厅等候。我个人建议您对他的迟到行为采取同样的方式回应。这样厄本就会明白，他的迟到行为并没有不了了之。不过，我不再耽误您的时间了。此时此刻，您的朝廷正密切关注您的每一步举动。”

languages.text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, el gobernador Drivestem le espera en la sala de audiencias. Le recomiendo que responda a su tardanza de igual modo. Así le dejará claro a Urbend que se ha fijado en su comportamiento. Sin embargo, tampoco debe esperar demasiado, ya que toda la corte vigila sus acciones ahora mismo».
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem is waiting in the audience hall. I advise you to respond to his lateness in kind — that way you can let Urbend know that his behaviour has not gone unremarked. But I would not delay too long — right now, the court is closely observing your every step."

traits.locale_text: «Mi{mf|lord|lady}, el gobernador Drivestem le espera en la sala de audiencias. Le recomiendo que responda a su tardanza de igual modo. Así le dejará claro a Urbend que se ha fijado en su comportamiento. Sin embargo, tampoco debe esperar demasiado, ya que toda la corte vigila sus acciones ahora mismo».

languages.text: 「陛下、ドライブステム総督が謁見の間で待機しています。彼の遅刻に対して親切な対応をなされることをおすすめします。そうすることでアーベントに、何気ない行動もしっかり監視されているのだと知らせることができます。しかし、あまり待たせない方がいいでしょう。今、宮殿全体があなたの一挙手一投足を注意深く観察しているのですから」
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem is waiting in the audience hall. I advise you to respond to his lateness in kind — that way you can let Urbend know that his behaviour has not gone unremarked. But I would not delay too long — right now, the court is closely observing your every step."

traits.locale_text: 「陛下、ドライブステム総督が謁見の間で待機しています。彼の遅刻に対して親切な対応をなされることをおすすめします。そうすることでアーベントに、何気ない行動もしっかり監視されているのだと知らせることができます。しかし、あまり待たせない方がいいでしょう。今、宮殿全体があなたの一挙手一投足を注意深く観察しているのですから」

languages.text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Gouverneur Drivestem wartet in der Audienzhalle. Ich rate Euch, ihn ebenfalls warten zu lassen – so lasst Ihr Urbend wissen, dass sein Verhalten nicht unbemerkt geblieben ist. Aber nicht zu lange – momentan beobachtet der Hof jeden Eurer Schritte ganz genau."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem is waiting in the audience hall. I advise you to respond to his lateness in kind — that way you can let Urbend know that his behaviour has not gone unremarked. But I would not delay too long — right now, the court is closely observing your every step."

traits.locale_text: "Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}, Gouverneur Drivestem wartet in der Audienzhalle. Ich rate Euch, ihn ebenfalls warten zu lassen – so lasst Ihr Urbend wissen, dass sein Verhalten nicht unbemerkt geblieben ist. Aber nicht zu lange – momentan beobachtet der Hof jeden Eurer Schritte ganz genau."

languages.text: « Votre Seigneurie, le gouverneur Drivestem vous attend dans la salle d'audience. Pour le punir de son retard, je vous conseille de lui rendre la monnaie de sa pièce. Ainsi, Urbend saura que vous avez parfaitement compris ses petites manœuvres. Cela dit, je ne le ferais pas attendre trop longtemps non plus, car la cour surveille le moindre de vos mouvements. »
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem is waiting in the audience hall. I advise you to respond to his lateness in kind — that way you can let Urbend know that his behaviour has not gone unremarked. But I would not delay too long — right now, the court is closely observing your every step."

traits.locale_text: « Votre Seigneurie, le gouverneur Drivestem vous attend dans la salle d'audience. Pour le punir de son retard, je vous conseille de lui rendre la monnaie de sa pièce. Ainsi, Urbend saura que vous avez parfaitement compris ses petites manœuvres. Cela dit, je ne le ferais pas attendre trop longtemps non plus, car la cour surveille le moindre de vos mouvements. »

languages.text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Vali Drivestem sizi karşılama salonunda bekliyor. O geciktiği için sizin de daha beteriyle tepki göstermenizi öneririm... Böylelikle Urbend'e davranışlarının gözden kaçmadığını gösterebilirsiniz. Öte yandan çok da gecikmeyin... Şu an tüm saray, pür dikkat her adımınızı izliyor."
languages.original_text: "Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}, Governor Drivestem is waiting in the audience hall. I advise you to respond to his lateness in kind — that way you can let Urbend know that his behaviour has not gone unremarked. But I would not delay too long — right now, the court is closely observing your every step."

traits.locale_text: "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri, Vali Drivestem sizi karşılama salonunda bekliyor. O geciktiği için, sizin de daha beteriyle tepki göstermenizi öneririm... Böylelikle Urbend'e davranışlarının gözden kaçmadığını gösterebilirsiniz. Öte yandan çok da gecikmeyin... Şu an tüm saray, pür dikkat her adımınızı izliyor."
